string-array.item: Java is Programming Language. Based on Object Oriented Concepts.
Scala is Programming Language. Based on Functional and Object Oriented Concepts.
JVM is acronym for Java Virtual Machine is where we can run our Java Programs.
Dalvik VM is layer on mobile device built using Linux Kernel on which Android OS runs.
Programming Language is high level tool to create software.
Framework makes to easy to write certain complex Operations in Programming Language.
SQL Lite is Database used in Android OS.
Android Studio is IDE in which we can build Android Applications.
